title: How much computer time is too much? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sachin, It all depends on you and the way you plan your time in a single day. There is no right or wrong answer, however, a moderate approach is what is recommended. The technology, apps and Social media in a way assist to share, connect and stay in touch with our loved ones, family and friends It also help learn and build a professional network Now,how we use it depend on us . There is no defined formula which says if you use it for x hours it won't harm or more than Y hours it is beneficial. Use discretion, depending on what you use it for and how much should you use. Anything in excess and beyond normal limits is never considered good, not even good stuff,so use your discretion and adopt a middle ground avoiding excess
